artist: Artist: Natori Shunsen; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head of man wearing green kimono; brown ground with leaf and swirl pattern
markings: red artist\'s seal: 春仙 {Shunsen}; publisher seal: 渡辺工 {Watanabe kō} (work of Watanabe); LLC, artist\'s hand-applied red approval seal: 名取 {Natori}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Creative Prints: Collected Portraits by Shunsen (Sōsaku hanga: Shunsen nigao-e shū 創作版画　春仙似顔画集)
text: Sixth design of a set of 36. Based on Nakamura Ganjirō I as Sakata Tōjūrō in the scene Munesei no gozashiki of the play Tōjūrō no koi 藤十郎の恋　宗淸の小座敷 (Tōjūrō's love), performed at the Shin-Tomi Theater, March–April 1921.
title: Actor Nakamura Ganjirō I as Sakata Tōjūrō
